channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Eleven-year-old Karis Musongole, who played young Elphaba in Wicked, flies into the studio for some Halloween fun and to show how to make creepy (but tasty!) witches? fingers. We reveal how you can get the Elphaba look at home, and don?t miss our latest spooky Book Club read.
